name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience adept in implementing CI/CD pipelines, utilizing tools such as **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **Docker**. Extensive experience in automating infrastructure provisioning with **Terraform** and **AWS CloudFormation**, ensuring seamless deployment on **AWS** and **Kubernetes**. Proficient in source control using **Git** and optimizing workflows for efficient collaboration.

In my previous roles as a Full Stack Developer, I successfully delivered high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
